channel.title: My Home - Eswyn [Ambient Chill]
channel.description:
Here’s a little track that stemmed off of a track with a very different vibe (complextro). I took the breakdown from that track (it’s still in the works) and shifted it into a major key, tweaked some chords and added some new stuff, worked on it for a while, and now we’ve got this. It’s a pretty neat little track, and I hope you enjoy it. I’m working on an extended edit as well, plus the original complextro track is still in the works. Enjoy!
https://soundcloud.com/eswyn/my-home
